+this.EXPORTED_SYMBOLS = ["InvalidSignatureError"];
+
+class InvalidSignatureError extends Error {}
body_text: JSMs are unfortunately not as cheap as they should be. Does this really need its own file? Maybe it could live as a property on either NormandyApi or RecipeRunner and be reused from there?
body: JSMs are unfortunately not as cheap as they should be. Does this really need its own file? Maybe it could live as a property on either NormandyApi or RecipeRunner and be reused from there?
